name: JoyAether
tag_list: hong-kong, versus-mode, multiplay, gamification, strategy, mobile, apps, ios, iphone, ipad, emagazine, education, android, 3d, publishing, platform
overview:
JoyAether produces next-generation mobile apps and games, for the iOS and Android platforms.

JoyAether’s product division contains three product lines: Utility Apps, Mobile Marketing, and Versus-mode Games. The Utility line of products include D33P, a social photo app that employs advanced image processing and 2D-to-3D technologies. The Mobile Marketing line includes Easel, an interactive eMagazine and educational content publishing platform. Versus-mode games include Bunny Battle, a mobile game with single, live versus human, and versus-computer modes.

JoyAether’s consulting division offers expert opinions and services, regarding mobile and tablet app strategies and gamification of marketing, for companies such as Pfizer, UBM, Haemonetics, Restylane, etc.
